mapper.sql: student_id, address_id, student_name, student_num, gender, native_place, home_address, telephone, email, document_type, document_number, nation, birth_date, age, education, profession, graduation_date, parents_name, parents_tel, emergency_contact, emergency_contact_tel, household_registration_code, student_state
mapper.insert: insert into student_information (student_id, address_id, student_name, student_num, gender, native_place, home_address, telephone, email, document_type, document_number, nation, birth_date, age, education, profession, graduation_date, parents_name, parents_tel, emergency_contact, emergency_contact_tel, household_registration_code, student_state ) values (#{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{documentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{documentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{graduationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{parentsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentsTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emergencyContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emergencyContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{householdRegistrationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentState,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update student_information
address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
student_num = #{studentNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
home_address = #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
document_type = #{documentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
document_number = #{documentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birth_date = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
graduation_date = #{graduationDate,jdbcType=DATE},
parents_name = #{parentsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parents_tel = #{parentsTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emergency_contact = #{emergencyContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emergency_contact_tel = #{emergencyContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
household_registration_code = #{householdRegistrationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state_id = #{studentState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update student_information set address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_num = #{studentNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, home_address = #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, document_type = #{documentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, document_number = #{documentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth_date = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, graduation_date = #{graduationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, parents_name = #{parentsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parents_tel = #{parentsTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emergency_contact = #{emergencyContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emergency_contact_tel = #{emergencyContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, household_registration_code = #{householdRegistrationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_state = #{studentState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT si.*,ad.address_name,g.`grade_id`,g.`grade_name`,g.`start_time`,m.`major_id`,m.`major_name`,p.`version_num`,p.`version_state` FROM student_information si,grade g,grade_student gs, teacher t,grade_teacher gt,teacher_course tc, chapter c,study_parts sp, production p,major m, state s,address ad WHERE gs.`grade_id`=g.`grade_id` AND gs.`student_id`=si.`student_id` AND gt.`grade_id`=g.`grade_id` AND gt.`teacher_id`=t.`teacher_id` AND tc.`chapter_id`=c.`chapter_id` AND tc.`teacher_id`=t.`teacher_id` AND sp.`study_parts_id`=c.`study_parts_id` AND p.`production_id`=sp.`production_id` AND m.`major_id`=p.`major_id` AND si.`state_id`=s.`state_id` AND si.address_id=ad.address_id GROUP BY si.`student_id`

SELECT si.*,ad.address_name,g.`grade_id`,g.`grade_name`,g.`start_time`,m.`major_id`,m.`major_name`,p.`version_num`,p.`version_state` FROM student_information si,grade g,grade_student gs, teacher t,grade_teacher gt,teacher_course tc, chapter c,study_parts sp, production p,major m, state s,address ad WHERE gs.`grade_id`=g.`grade_id` AND gs.`student_id`=si.`student_id` AND gt.`grade_id`=g.`grade_id` AND gt.`teacher_id`=t.`teacher_id` AND tc.`chapter_id`=c.`chapter_id` AND tc.`teacher_id`=t.`teacher_id` AND sp.`study_parts_id`=c.`study_parts_id` AND p.`production_id`=sp.`production_id` AND m.`major_id`=p.`major_id` AND si.`state_id`=s.`state_id` AND si.address_id=ad.address_id AND si.student_id=#{studentId} GROUP BY si.`student_id`

SELECT si.`student_id`,si.`student_name`,g.`grade_id`,g.`grade_name`,e.*,t.`teacher_id`,t.`teacher_name` FROM student_information si,employment e,grade g,grade_student gs, teacher t,grade_teacher gt, user_role ur,role r, state s WHERE gs.`grade_id`=g.`grade_id` AND gs.`student_id`=si.`student_id` AND gt.`grade_id`=g.`grade_id` AND gt.`teacher_id`=t.`teacher_id` AND e.`student_id`=si.`student_id` AND t.`user_role_id`=ur.`user_role_id` AND ur.`role_id`=r.`role_id` AND si.`state_id`=s.`state_id` AND r.`role_id`=11 AND s.`state_id`=12

SELECT si.`student_id`,si.`student_name`,g.`grade_id`,g.`grade_name`,e.*,t.`teacher_id`,t.`teacher_name` FROM student_information si,employment e,grade g,grade_student gs, teacher t,grade_teacher gt, user_role ur,role r, state s WHERE gs.`grade_id`=g.`grade_id` AND gs.`student_id`=si.`student_id` AND gt.`grade_id`=g.`grade_id` AND gt.`teacher_id`=t.`teacher_id` AND e.`student_id`=si.`student_id` AND t.`user_role_id`=ur.`user_role_id` AND ur.`role_id`=r.`role_id` AND si.`state_id`=s.`state_id` AND r.`role_id`=11 AND s.`state_id`=12 AND si.student_id=#{studentId}

SELECT si.`student_id`,si.`student_name`,si.`age`,si.`telephone`,gsvr.`graduation_student_visit_record_id`,gsvr.`review_content`,gsvr.`visit_time`,t.`teacher_id`,t.`teacher_name` FROM student_information si,graduation_student_visit_record gsvr,grade g,grade_student gs, teacher t,grade_teacher gt, user_role ur,role r, state s WHERE si.`student_id`=gsvr.`student_id` AND gs.`grade_id`=g.`grade_id` AND gs.`student_id`=si.`student_id` AND gt.`grade_id`=g.`grade_id` AND gt.`teacher_id`=t.`teacher_id` AND t.`user_role_id`=ur.`user_role_id` AND ur.`role_id`=r.`role_id` AND si.`state_id`=s.`state_id` AND r.`role_id`=11 AND s.`state_id`=12
AND si.`student_name`=#{studentName}

SELECT si.`student_id`,si.`student_name`,si.`age`,si.`telephone`,gsvr.`graduation_student_visit_record_id`,gsvr.`review_content`,gsvr.`visit_time`,t.`teacher_id`,t.`teacher_name` FROM student_information si,graduation_student_visit_record gsvr,grade g,grade_student gs, teacher t,grade_teacher gt, user_role ur,role r, state s WHERE si.`student_id`=gsvr.`student_id` AND gs.`grade_id`=g.`grade_id` AND gs.`student_id`=si.`student_id` AND gt.`grade_id`=g.`grade_id` AND gt.`teacher_id`=t.`teacher_id` AND t.`user_role_id`=ur.`user_role_id` AND ur.`role_id`=r.`role_id` AND si.`state_id`=s.`state_id` AND r.`role_id`=11 AND s.`state_id`=12 and si.student_id=#{studentId}
